attributes.action: A free 24hr Great Britain bus and rail pass for O.A.P's,the disabled and war pensioners i.e.England Scotland Wales and N.Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Instead of getting a pass for their local area there should be a nationwide pass.If we want to travel to see family it does cost a lot of money and on a pension be it state or war it is nigh on impossible.
I am asking people to sign my petition to help the people on the lowest incomes
who have worked all their lives and to help the ones who served theirs and your country and help the ones who are disabled.Because the costs of travel are astronomical it is very hard or the money is not there to travel so please sign my petition.
